name: openclaw-memory-pinecone
description: Long-term memory for OpenClaw using Pinecone with integrated inference embeddings

pineconeApiKey.description: Pinecone API key. Supports ${PINECONE_API_KEY} env var syntax.

indexName.description: Pinecone index name. Auto-created with integrated inference if missing.

namespace.description: Namespace to scope memories per project or user.

autoCapture.description: Automatically store memories after each conversation turn.

autoRecall.description: Automatically inject relevant memories before each turn.

topK.description: Maximum number of memories to recall per search.

similarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for search results (0-1).

deduplicationThreshold.description: Score above which a memory is considered a duplicate (0-1).
